Introduction
This topic contains information on payments excluded by Federal statutes in calculating income and/or net worth, including
exhibit 1 for payments excluded for all income-based benefits
, and
exhibit 2 for payments excluded for current-law pension and Parentsâ€™ DIC only

title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I - Counting Specific Types of Income
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section I
